name: mri_watershed
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: A tool for stripping skull and other non-brain tissues to produce brain volume from T1 volume.

inputs.description: Input volume (e.g., T1 volume)
inputs.name: Input Volume

inputs.description: Output volume (e.g., skull stripped brain volume)
inputs.name: Output Volume

inputs.description: Preweight the input image using atlas information
inputs.name: Weight

inputs.description: Don't use the preweighting for the template deformation
inputs.name: No WTA Flag

inputs.description: Use the basins merging using atlas information
inputs.name: Proba Merging

inputs.description: Pre-size the preflooding height (in percent)
inputs.name: Preflooding Height

inputs.description: Don't use seedpoints using atlas information
inputs.name: No Seedpoint Flag

inputs.description: Don't use template deformation using atlas information
inputs.name: No TA Flag

inputs.description: Just copy input to output, ignore other options
inputs.name: Copy Flag

inputs.description: Use the atlas information to correct the segmentation
inputs.name: Atlas Flag

inputs.description: Save the BEM surfaces; use consistent coordinates with tkmedit
inputs.name: Surface Name

inputs.description: Use the surface RAS coordinates for surfaces
inputs.name: Use Surface RAS Flag

inputs.description: Don't do T1 analysis, useful when running out of memory
inputs.name: No T1 Analysis Flag

inputs.description: Shrink the surface
inputs.name: Shrink Surface Flag

inputs.description: Expand the surface
inputs.name: Expand Surface Flag

inputs.description: Use only the watershed algorithm
inputs.name: Use Watershed Flag

inputs.description: Specify T1 input volume
inputs.name: T1 Volume

inputs.description: Use watershed algorithm and first template smoothing
inputs.name: Watershed and Template Flag

inputs.description: Use only the first template smoothing + local matching
inputs.name: First Template Flag

inputs.description: Visualize the surfaces onto the output volume
inputs.name: Surface Debug Flag

inputs.description: Save the brain surface
inputs.name: Brain Surface Name

inputs.description: Save the brain surface shrank inward by a specified mm
inputs.name: Shrink Brain Surface

inputs.description: Add a seed point as a 3D coordinate
inputs.name: Seed Point

inputs.description: Specify the center of the brain (voxel coordinates)
inputs.name: Center Brain

inputs.description: Specify the radius of the brain (voxel units)
inputs.name: Brain Radius

inputs.description: Change the threshold in the watershed process
inputs.name: Watershed Threshold

inputs.description: Don't use the watershed analysis process
inputs.name: No Watershed Analysis Flag

inputs.description: Labelize the output volume into scalp, skull, csf, gray, and white matter
inputs.name: Label Flag

inputs.description: Change parameters csf_max, transition intensity, and GM_intensity
inputs.name: Manual Params

inputs.description: Remove voxels whose intensity exceeds the specified threshold
inputs.name: X Threshold

inputs.description: Mask a volume with the brain mask
inputs.name: Mask Flag
